parts.description: A man plants a seed in his garden.
The seed sprouts, and he cares for the growing plant diligently.
One morning, he discovers a rare butterfly resting on the plant.
The encounter inspires him to create a butterfly garden, transforming his backyard into a haven for wildlife.
A frog jumps into the pond—
The moment captures the serenity and suddenness of nature.
Character A greets Character B in the morning.
They discuss plans for the day.
Character B reveals they have won a trip to an exotic location.
Both characters celebrate, setting off on a new adventure.
Introduction of a remote hot spring town in Japan.
Development of the relationship between the protagonist and a geisha.
The appearance of another woman introduces emotional complexity.
The story concludes with reflections on beauty and transience.
